definition: of no avail/not helping in the least
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: But the damage is done now. Saying sorry won’t mend anything.
sentences.chinese: 但木已成舟，說難過也於事無補了。

sentences.english: There are difficulties, but being defeatist can't help.
sentences.chinese: 困難總會有，但是認輸氣餒卻於事無補。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 庫存量的快速削減和信貸市場上的臨時畸變於事無補。

sentences.english: Cui Zhen fact appeals to police ransack nitty-gritty , but at job of no help.
sentences.chinese: 崔真實向警方求助搜查事實真相，但於事無補。

sentences.english: Once their public articles meant little for the worldliness, they would be happy to write novels.
sentences.chinese: 經濟文章，無補於世，也會不甘寂寞，去著小說。

sentences.english: I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我的雄辯也無補於事實了。

sentences.english: But incase you don't fit the bill, remember getting disheartened ain't gonna help.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你沒有達到這個標準，記住沮喪於事無補。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 庫存量的快速削減和信貸市場上的臨時畸變於事無補。

sentences.english: But such a concept is a nonstarter as far as the developed world is concerned.
sentences.chinese: 但對發達國家而言，這種觀念於事無補。

sentences.english: It is useless to say anything at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 現在再多說也無補於事。

sentences.english: A decision will not become effective unless the action commitments have been built into the decision from the start.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該將行動歸入決策當中，否則就是空言無補。

sentences.english: Nor will the close monitoring of naked officials.
sentences.chinese: 嚴密監視裸官也於事無補。

sentences.english: What is unlikely to help is the atmosphere of bitterness and recrimination that is pervading Capitol Hill.
sentences.chinese: 譏諷的氛圍和遍佈國會的互相指責是於是無補的。

sentences.english: To my mind this is an attempt to simplify the world in a way that is actually unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來這是試圖簡化世界，實際上是於事無補的。

sentences.english: When it’s bitter in the heart no sugar in the mouth helps.
sentences.chinese: 口中之糖無補於心中之痛。
跟他們爭論是徒勞無補的。
